meanings.sent1: The kind teacher was reputable among the students.
meanings.sent2: A reputable company always delivers high-quality products.
meanings.sent3: The reputable squirrel was known for its acorn-gathering skills.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as reputable as a beacon in the dark.
meanings.sent5: The reputable knight's bravery was legendary in the kingdom.

meanings.sent1: The reputable doctor was trusted by all the patients.
meanings.sent2: A reputable mechanic will always give you honest advice.
meanings.sent3: The reputable cat earned the respect of the other animals in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His advice was as reputable as gold in the eyes of his friends.
meanings.sent5: The reputable firefighter's courage inspired the whole town.
